item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Salem Common

WHEN: Saturday, 7/28 3:00 p.m. -6:00 p.m.

THE SCENE: A large grassy field surrounded by a fence and rimmed by historic buildings

WHERE TO MEET: At the common anytime after 3.

DIRECTIONS: From 128, take route 114E and follow it closely into salem center. Once in the center find route 1A and the common will be on your right next to the historic Hawthorne Hotel.

OTHER:
It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
If you have any questions about what to bring, don't hesitate to ask.
If you become lost getting there, call.
It's assumed that you have a half hour of leeway to meet us. After that we will leave without you.
item.name: OUTING: Saturday 7/28th, Salem
